channel.title: Sql on huing的博客
channel.description: Recent content in Sql on huing的博客

item.title: Sql语法
item.description: 精确匹配 id SELECT * FROM menu WHERE id = 569; 模糊匹配 SELECT * FROM menu WHERE path LIKE '%teacher%'; 定义变量 SET @path = 'teacher'; SELECT * FROM menu WHERE path LIKE CONCAT('%', @path, '%'); 连表查询 SELECT a.id,a.NAME,b.num FROM classes a LEFT JOIN classes_detail b ON a.id=b.id WHERE a.id=2541; IS NULL SELECT * FROM classes WHERE person_avg IS NULL;
